heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_mars
heroes.bio_loc:
玛尔斯，天界的长子，在漫长的时光里发动了无尽的战争，也目睹了飘扬着他原来名字的战旗下，无数更多的战事。征服之战，复仇之战。有的正义，有的邪恶……只有残忍别无二致。就像他的父亲，玛尔斯不压抑自己最基本的冲动——而他的爱好远比宙斯的可怕——他造成的痛苦数之不尽。

但是随着数个时代消失在他身后，他父亲的自私行径——也是多数认为他可憎的神族同胞的行径，终于变得虚假。纯粹的战争不再足以满足他的欲望。在他不老的岁月里，战神首次质问自己要将辉煌的战矛挥向何处。

而在命运的安排下，他的解决办法随即而来：为了更高的追求而发动战争，带来的启示也不仅仅是眼下的残暴与悲伤。他必定终将行使与生俱来的权利，负起领袖的责任，是时候摧毁旧时代的万神殿，在他同胞的余烬上建立新的帝国。只有那时，他才能得到满足，才能让玛尔斯的荣光让世人目睹。
heroes.hype_loc: 战士的神明玛尔斯在冲突的中心傲然挺立，在致命的坚盾掩护之下他传奇的战矛刺穿敌人。在余烬军团的忠实成员环绕的竞技场中，他陶醉于对手的决战之中，而他们将确保无人可以临阵脱逃，而不论他面临何种危机，战神都能化险为夷，因为他知道众人都站在他这边。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 将敌人困在无法逃脱的竞技场

abilities.name: mars_spear
abilities.desc_loc: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
abilities.lore_loc: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
notes_loc: Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Spear of Mars will only pin a unit to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.
abilities.shard_loc: Spear of Mars impales up to %max_impale_targets% and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

abilities.name: mars_gods_rebuke
abilities.desc_loc: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
abilities.lore_loc: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
notes_loc: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.

abilities.name: mars_bulwark
abilities.desc_loc:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, granting phased movement, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs %redirect_chance%%% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
abilities.lore_loc: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
notes_loc: Redirect only works if the projectile targets are in a cone behind Mars or within 100 range of him.
Break disables the front and side damage reduction.
abilities.scepter_loc: Creates %soldier_count% invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage, knock back and slow approaching enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

abilities.name: mars_dauntless
abilities.desc_loc: Mars gets more HP Regen the more he and his allies are outnumbered by enemy heroes in %radius% radius.

abilities.name: mars_arena_of_blood
abilities.desc_loc: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
abilities.lore_loc: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.
facets_loc: If Mars is in the Arena when an enemy dies inside of it, he restores %arena_kill_buff_heal_pct%%% of his max health and mana and gets a %arena_kill_buff_damage_pct%%% attack damage buff for %arena_kill_buff_duration%s. Allies inside the Arena receive %allied_reduction_pct%%% of the bonuses.
Arena of Blood obscures vision and enemies within the arena do not share vision with their allies.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_mars_arena_of_blood_hp_regen
talents.name_loc: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +{s:value} HP Regen

facets.description_loc: Mars and his allies gain health, mana, and attack damage when an enemy inside his Arena of Blood dies.
facets.name: mars_victory_feast

facets.description_loc: Enemies inside the Arena of Blood don't have vision outside the arena.
facets.name: mars_arena

new_abilities.name: mars_dauntless
new_abilities.desc_loc: Mars gets more HP Regen the more he and his allies are outnumbered by enemy heroes in %radius% radius.
